text: وانى عذت بربى وربكم ان ترجمون

translations.translation: I have sought refuge with my Lord and your Lord against your stoning me.
I have taken refuge in my Lord and your Lord against your stoning me to death.
I have taken refuge with my Lord and your Lord lest you should attack me with stones.
I seek protection from my Lord and your Lord from your decision of stoning me.
“And I take the refuge of my Lord and yours, against your stoning me.”
And truly, I seek refuge with my Lord and your Lord, lest you should stone me."
And surely I take refuge with my Lord and your Lord that you should stone me to death:
and I take refuge in my Lord and your Lord, lest you should stone me.
And lo! I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord lest ye stone me to death.
I have sought refuge with my Lord and your Lord lest you stone me [to death].
And verily I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord lest ye stone me.
I seek the protection of my Lord and your Lord, lest you should stone me.
For me, I have sought safety with my Lord and your Lord, against your injuring me.
And truly, I seek refuge in my Lord and your Lord, lest you stone me (or call me a sorcerer or kill me).
I take refuge with my Lord and your Lord lest you stone me.
I have taken refuge in my Lord and your Lord, lest you stone me.
And indeed, I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord, lest you stone me.
[44:20] So he said, ‘And truly I seek refuge in my Lord and your Lord, lest you should stone me, [to death] with rocks.
(And lo! I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord lest ye stone me to death) lest you kill me.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { أَن تَرْجُمُونِ } معناه تَقْتُلون

translations.translation: And his saying, " {that you kill } " means that you kill

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ أن ترجمون } من أن ترجمون
 أي: تؤذونني ضرباً وشتماً
 أو تقتلوني رجماً
 قيل: لما قال: { وأن لا تعلوا على الله } توعّدوه بالرجم
 فتوكّل على الله
 واعتصم به
 ولم يُبال بما توعّدوه
 { وإِن لم تؤمنوا لي فاعتزلونِ } أي: وإن كابرتم ولم تُذعنوا لي
 فلا مولاة بيني وبين مَن لا يؤمن
 فتنحُّوا عني
 أو: فخلُّوني كفافاً لا لي ولا عليّ
 ولا تتعرضوا لي بشرِّكم وأذاكم
 فليس ذلك جزاء مَن دعاكم إلى ما فيه فلا حُكم
 قال أبو السعود: وحَمْلُه على قطع الوصلة وعدم الموالاة بينه وبينهم
 يأباه المقام
